Amdocs’ purpose is to enrich lives and progress society, using creativity and technology to build a better connected world. Amdocs and its 25,000 employees serve the leading players in the communications and media industry, enabling next-generation experiences in 85 countries. Our cloud-native, open and dynamic portfolio of digital solutions, platforms and services brings greater choice, faster time to market and flexibility, to better meet the evolving needs of our customers as they drive growth, transform and take their business to the cloud. Listed on the NASDAQ Global Select Market, Amdocs had revenue of $4.1 billion in fiscal 2019.
job_description: This recruitment of Amdocs is for candidates who have Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience. Candidate must have hands on experience in EXCEL (preferably advanced skills). Should have good analytical and problem-solving skills. Candidate should be good in communication. Candidate is accountable and responsible for collecting inputs and producing reports as defined for Jade and Dev/Test SLAs.

about_company: Dassault Systèmes Recruitment 2020 Hiring: Join Dassault Systèmes, The 3DEXPERIENCE Company. Everything becomes possible with Dassault Systèmes’ 3DEXPERIENCE virtual universes! Serving 230,000 customers in 11 industries, from high-tech to life sciences, fashion to transportation, we help businesses and people around the world to create sustainable innovations for today and tomorrow. Get on board a leading and fast-growing company of 17,000 talented professionals.
job_description: We are seeking a resource having experience in Web Development to work with our Digital Enterprise Systems team. You will be reporting to the manager in Pune.
